original_text: and whoever touches a swarming thing by which he may be made unclean or a person from whom he may take uncleanness, whatever his uncleanness may be—
korean_text: 무릇 사람을 부정하게 하는 벌레에 접촉된 모든 사람과 무슨 부정이든지 사람을 더럽힐 만한 것에게 접촉된 자

sentences.original_text: and whoever touches a swarming thing
by which he may be made unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로 말미암아 부정하게 될 수 있는

sentences.original_text: from whom he may take uncleanness
